posts.post_content:
So it looks like M12 is giving us [Jace, Memory Adept](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, Memory Adept) in place of this guy. Unless I just totally got trolled by like 5 sites at the same time.  
  
**Jace, Memory Adept**  
{3}{U}{U}  
Planeswalker – Jace Mythic Rare  
  
+1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.  
0: Target player puts the top 10 cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.  
-7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.  
Loyalty 4  
  
I really don't know. Of course [Jace, the Mind Sculptor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace, the Mind Sculptor) wasn't going to get a reprint. So it was [Jace Beleren](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace Beleren) or something new. While it's nice that you can use JMA for straight draw while building loyalty without getting your opponent a card too (and actually a pretty cool ultimate for a mill/control deck), he's 5 CMC. 2 more than baby Jace (so what, Memory Adept must be Middle Sibling Jace), and one more than the general sweet spot for a 'walker. And the foc... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
So I pulled this in a M11 (along with a holo [Drowned Catacomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drowned Catacomb), sweet) and I traded a few things for my friend's JvC Jace. I might make a Standard Mill deck now.
  
   
I also remember when I was watching a duel. One of my friends was using a B/Bk deck of sorts, and Jaced himself. He sent his top 20 cards to his grave and finished with [Mortal Combat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mortal Combat). Fatality.

Posted By: Joseph_Leito (6/7/2011 12:17:53 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I think this really benefits from [Rooftop Storm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rooftop Storm). If you get two or more Beleren's out and every zombie you draw costs nothing...that is a serious advantage. [Undead Alchemist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Undead Alchemist) makes that combo even deadlier, and then use the ultimate to get more Zombies. Throw in [Lich Lord of Unx](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lich Lord of Unx), [Jace's Erasure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace's Erasure), and some other cards and you've got a pretty decent zombie swarm mill deck.
posts.html:
I think this really benefits from Rooftop Storm. If you get two or more Beleren's out and every zombie you draw costs nothing...that is a serious advantage. Undead Alchemist makes that combo even deadlier, and then use the ultimate to get more Zombies. Throw in Lich Lord of Unx, Jace's Erasure, and some other cards and you've got a pretty decent zombie swarm mill deck.

Posted By: jstorrie (7/14/2011 3:17:23 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@marwinshieldscale:
  
   
An interesting thing to note was that when they released the visual spoiler, the only planeswalkers shown were [Gideon Jura](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gideon Jura) and [Sorin Markov](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sorin Markov). No red, green, or blue planeswalker. Upon seeing this, I automatically thought, "Now why would they show two and not all five?" I figured that they had new planeswalkers for the other colors. So far, I've been right. I'm hoping for a new Chandra and Garruk, but we'll just have to wait and see. They release new cards every day now, so keep checking back and maybe we'll get new planeswalkers to go along with our memory adept.
  
   
EDIT
  
   
We now know that there are new Garruks and Chandras, Primal Hunter and the Firebrand, respectively.
posts.html:
